name: Cucumber Pinwheels
description: Easy-to-pack, easy-to-eat tortilla roll-ups! Use your fave dip mix (we love 3 Onion!) for a flavour boost. Ready in 10 minutes.

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or Herb & Garlic Dip

preparation:
1. In a small bowl, combine dip mix and cream cheese. Set aside. 
  2. Thinly slice cucumber into rounds.  
  3. Spread cream cheese mixture over tortillas. Arrange cucumber slices in a single layer over cream cheese. Roll up tightly. Using a sharp knife, slice each roll into 6 pieces, each 1â€“1 1⁄2" thick.  
  4. If making ahead, wrap whole, unsliced rolls and refrigerate for up to 2 days.
tips:
For some added protein, layer deli meat over cucumber slices before rolling. 

Use the 4-in-1 Mandoline, fitted with the 1.5 mm slicer, to quickly slice cucumber.
